Package scriptmanager.charts

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositePlot
    Collection of static methods for plotting lines of sense & antisense or combined composite plots with customizable titles, colors, and legends.
    HeatMap
    Collection of static methods for formatting and plotting data into heatmaps of matrix values
    Histogram
    Collection of static methods for plotting interactive histograms.
    LineChart
    Collection of static methods for plotting interactive line charts.
    ScalingPlotter
    Static methods for building charts for the Scaling Factor tool (particularly NCIS-related plots).
